definition: fat (in the body, in a plant, or in food)

pinyin: bu4 bao3 he2 zhi1 fang2 suan1

sentences.english: Our unique Bio-lipid coating insures bio-availability.
sentences.chinese: 我们独特的生物脂涂层确保了生物有效性。

sentences.english: It recognizes lipopolysaccharide, a component of the outer membrane of Gram-negative bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 它识别广泛存在革兰氏阴性菌细胞外膜上的脂多糖。

sentences.english: There is a posterior midline fatty lesion consistent with lipoma.
sentences.chinese: 下后部中线位置脂性病变，符合脂肪瘤表现。

sentences.english: Although fat-soluble , it is needed daily.
sentences.chinese: 虽然脂溶性，它每天需要。

sentences.english: How many men do you know who eat low-calorie or fat-free anything ?
sentences.chinese: 看看有几个男人专吃低热或者去脂食品？

sentences.english: Calcium is more like a fat-soluble vitamin because it requires a carrier for absorption and transport.
sentences.chinese: 钙更像脂溶性维生素，因为它的吸收和运输需要载体。

sentences.english: Introduce the character of high-temperature greases and the successful application to cold bed chain.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了高温脂的特性，及在冷床链条中的成功应用。

sentences.english: Lipid rafts are liquid- ordered membrane microdomains with a unique protein and lipid composition found on the plasma membrane.
sentences.chinese: 脂筏是膜脂双层内含有特殊脂质及蛋白质的微区。

sentences.english: The plastic that used to be used to make baby bottles is a polycarbonate.
sentences.chinese: 被用于婴儿奶瓶的塑料是聚碳酸脂。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the clinical characteristics and treatment of nodular panniculitis disease in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨结节性脂膜炎的临床特点及治疗措施。

sentences.english: It is best taken with food to improve absorption as it is fat soluble .
sentences.chinese: 这是最好的食物，以改善吸收，因为它是脂溶性。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the multisliee helical CT manifestations of mesenteric panniculitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨多层螺旋CT对肠系膜脂膜炎的诊断价值。

sentences.english: This patient has been misdiagnosed as vasculitis and nodular panniculitis.
sentences.chinese: 曾被误诊为“血管炎”及“结节性脂膜炎”。

sentences.english: Rice bran is a resource rich in vegetable lipopolysaccharide (LPS).
sentences.chinese: 米糠是富含植物脂多糖的植物资源。

sentences.english: Pits are formed in the polycarbonate disk by an injection molding process.
sentences.chinese: 坑形通过注塑工艺在聚碳酸脂盘面形成。

sentences.english: Technical target of the product on zinc - plated wire rope grease is formulated.
sentences.chinese: 制定镀锌钢丝绳脂产品技术指标。

definition: fat (in the body, in a plant, or in food)
